ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) can fully cooked luncheon meat (such as SPAM®), cubed
¾ (1 pound) loaf processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®), cubed
½ cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)

cookingTips: Mix the cheese and SPAM filling ahead for quick assembly
Watch carefully while baking to prevent over-browning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand how to combine processed cheese and meat into a creamy filling and assemble efficiently for baking.
